title: Hot 97's Ebro & Papoose Trade Tweets Over Remy Ma's Carnal "SHETHER" Claims
text:
1 
New York City, NY ‚Äì In unsurprising news, Hot 97‚Äôs Old Man Ebro has flat-out denied that he slept with Nicki Minaj like Remy Ma‚Äôs ‚ÄúSHETHER‚Äù diss record proclaimed. 
‚ÄúRemy knows she‚Äôs lying‚Ä¶ matter of fact the dude that told her that bullshit, she knows is a nerd!‚Äù he laughed before adding, ‚ÄúThese nerd as dudes always worried.‚Äù 
He also denied he was a married man, sneaking Barbies in his bedroom on the low. 
The rebuttal has prompted a public response from Remy Ma‚Äôs husband Papoose (in real life; not just Love & Hip Hop: New York ), who is saying Ebro had previously been geeked just to be a part of the spectacle. 
‚Äú@oldmanebro You just texted me happy as hell that Remy said it ‚Ä¶now she lying? ? Sit down bruh,‚Äù Pap tweeted. @oldmanebro You just texted me happy as hell that Remy said it ‚Ä¶now she lying? üòï Sit down bruh 
Ebro took no offense to being called a liar and inquired about Remy Ma‚Äôs next Hot 97 appearance. 
The line that involved Ebro in the story was this:
